name: Levantai!
description: We earned our freedom, and we will never let it go again!

name: Rebuild the Government
description: Rebuilding a state after decades of occupation is a daunting task, and one that requires our immediate attention

name: De-Centralisation of the Government
description: Our government right now is still to reminiscent to many to that of Brazil; we must change this

name: Reorganised Justice System
description: A restored constitution has been put in place, for the greater good of our nation

name: Lay of Land
description: A detailed land survey and great infrastructure works will be starting, to ensure the prosperity of our reborn nation

name: Great Public Works
description: Many of our greatest cities were left to rot under Paulista occupation. One more thing that wont happen in a free Goyaz

name: Finish Rebuilding of the State
description: The people now realise we are on their side, and the government functions properly. Goyaz vive!

name: Seize Foreign Assets
description: The Paulista land thieves have no business being here. All that it can take to change that is the signing of a decree...

name: Extensive Rearmament Program
description: Our new nation has to rebuild its military if it is to survive these troubled times

name: Seize Foreign Farms
description: Many Paulistas were keen to take advantage of the occupation and steal lands from our farmers, even if in absentia, they steal what is ours. We will no longer allow that to happen

name: Seize Paulista Property
description: Brazilian individuals and companies still hold a sway in our economy, and our fate. We cannot allow this to persist!

name: Industrial Effort
description: For many years, our manufactures suffered under heavy taxation, violence and arson by Paulista occupiers. We will need a concentrated effort to make our industry bounce back

name: Redouble Industrial Effort
description: Now with our industry recovered, we must expand it to ever greater heights!

name: Wartime Industry Adaptability
description: We will defend our freedom and independence at all costs, even if it means investing in the arms industry. Goyaz must be safe!

name: Air Base Expansion
description: Let us expand our airfields so both our Air Force and that of our allies can use them

name: Fortify Goyaz
description: Our capital will never fall to foreign invaders, thanks to a long and complex trench system, along with land mines, bunkers and constant garrisoning

name: Military Production Focus
description: Our troops need more than our support, they need our industry! Canned food, grenades, handguns, trucks; every little thing helps our young military

name: Reborn National Rhetoric
description: Epic explorers of a vast new land, bring civilisation to far off reaches of the world. The grand people of Goyaz have in their blood the legacy of pioneers and of civilisation itself

name: Nation Building
description: Both the young and the old must know that we are here not only to protect Goyaz, but each and every one of them from those who hate us and everything we stand for

name: Patriot Spirit
description: Instilling patriotism with the common citizenry is not simple, but is necessary if we want to be more than a splotch on the map, but once again a glorious republic

name: Nasce Uma Nação
description: Those who fought for our nation, even against unimaginable odds; Those who fought against Paulista occupation; Those who in their exile helped us regain our freedom. The defenders of the Chaco will be forever honoured for their deeds and sacrifices

name: The Army of Goyaz
description: Goyaz will be defended to the last man if need be, and we will stand vigilant to avoid Paulista treachery

name: Recruit New Officer Corps
description: Our officers scattered after the occupation began; many went into exile, others formed guerilla bands. We must restore the capacity of our army, and thus we will do an effort to track them, and invite them back

name: Infantry Equipment Licenses
description: There are currently to manufacturers in Goyaz qualified enough to do the sweeping equipment effort we need. And for that, we will approach foreigners, and acquire licenses and blueprints

name: Artillery Renewal
description: The few artillery pieces the occupying force left are not enough to properly outfit an army. We should act swiftly to remedy this, our men on the ground need the firepower!

name: Modern War Machines
description: We will ensure that our armoured and mobile forces can compete in this ever changing era of warfare

name: Special Forces of the Republic
description: We will have specially trained commandos, ready to defend their nation when the need arises

name: Renew Aerial Investments
description: Our air force was, in all respects, dismantled before it even took off. We must invest in new aircraft and staff if we want to keep the skies above the Chaco safe

name: Bomber Squadrons
description: Our air superiority will be meaningless if we can't rain fire and punishment upon the enemy!
